dt: {bc}an impairment (such as a stutter or a lisp) that interferes with the proper articulation of speech
{bc}a bar or hindrance (such as lack of sufficient age) to a lawful marriage

shortdef: something that impedes; especially : an impairment (such as a stutter or a lisp) that interferes with the proper articulation of speech
a bar or hindrance (such as lack of sufficient age) to a lawful marriage
